name: Ball Challenge (Andre Holtz)
description:
Ball Challenge is also on STEAM (18% OFF!!)

Are you able to accept this challenge and show that you have mastered the physics in the game?

With a retro pixel art look, Ball Challenge is a difficult game that requires a lot of skill and agility from the player to go through all it's challenges. Dodge monsters, spikes and traps, collect the necessary diamonds and try to reach the end of each level.

Controls:
  • Hold the left mouse button to aim. Release it to move the ball;
  • Right mouse button: cancel the movement;
  • R: restart the level;
  • ESC: pause;
